mapper.sql: id, platform_id, domain_id, app_name, alias, detail, create_time, update_time, debugging, try_count
mapper.insert: insert into debug_detail ( platform_id, domain_id, app_name, alias, detail, create_time, update_time, debugging, try_count) values ( #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,typeHandler=com.channelsoft.ccod.support.cmdb.dao.typeHandler.AppOperationInfoHandler}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{debugging,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{tryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
